name: Answerbase
tag_list: software, enterprise-software, qa-software, question-and-answer, software-as-a-service, e-commerce, customer-support, online-community, forum, tech, technology
overview:
Answerbase looks to offer enterprise grade social Q&A to websites of every size, in a web platform that is easy to setup and manage.

The platform is built and managed by Lumin Creative, who has been powering Q&A communities for some of the world’s most popular websites for years. Through Answerbase, Lumin Creative brings this powerful social Q&A platform to sites at every level. Our team is comprised of professionals and engineers with years of experience providing Q&A and social media solutions. Companies such as Edmunds.com, and Angie’s List can attest to the fact that with Answerbase you can count on a outstanding product with reliable service and support.

Answerbase offers a free trial as you get a feel for the service and has pricing tiers that will satisfy any level of client. Whether you are a startup website or blog or one of the most well trafficked sites in the world….we can serve you. With pricing starting at $15 per month, take a look at our available tiers today to see which one fits your needs.
